Accessory functions¶

This module contains a number of simple, but useful functons for handling RODEO input/output.

rodeo_utils.accessory.split_file(file_path, n=1000)[source]¶

Split a file into chunks with a given number of lines in each.

Resulting files are stored in the same directory as input. Useful to split files for RODEO since it doesn’t accept more than 1000 accession numbers.

Parameters:
  • file_path (str) – Path to the file to split.
  • n (int, optional) – The number of lines in each chunk.
